titleStmt.title: Wrens anatomy. Discovering his notorious pranks, and shamefull wickednesse; with some of his most lewd facts, and infamous deeds; both in his government of Peter-house Colledge, and domineering in three bishopricks, to his perpetuall shame and infamy.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, That Wren ceasd to domineere, 1641.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
